text: @GavinNewsom According to https://t.co/yN2yDdQaRb, in the US as of May 1, 2020, US Fatalities from all causes combined were 719,438. of that total 70,228 fatalities were due to pneumonia and influenza. 37,308 fatalities were due to covid19.  Why is the country closed? Why are we wearing masks
